values: 面孔；脸；脸部；表情；面容；外观；面；表面；正面；界面；方面；立面；特征；（事物呈现出的）外貌；（建筑物的）正立面；（山的）峭壁；（岩石或土壤的）露头
面对；对付；应付；正对；正视；面临；迎向；朝向；面向；涂抹；装饰表面；（以另一物）覆盖表面

synonym.mean: 脸；表面；面子；面容；外观；威信

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 面部的，表面的；脸的，面部用的
有某种面孔或表情的；有…表面的
匿名的，不知名的；无个性的；无脸面的
意外打击；（拳击中）面部所受的突然一击；铣刀盘

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重双方静止地面对面，或指指充满勇气、信心和决心正视人或事。
通常指遇到困难或挫折，也指偶然或意外地相遇。
普通用词，本义指双方或多方从不同方向或相反方向作向对运动，最终相碰(遇)。
多指通过书信、电话或直接会面和别人联系。口语用词。
不可避免的，面对面的相遇。也指敢于正视困难或问题的决心和信心。
口语用词，含义广，侧重有勇气、决心或自信心去面对。
书面用词，多指勇敢、冷静地面临某种问题、困难或任务等。
普通用词，多用复数，可与appearance换用，但较口语化。
书面用词，突出人或事物在某特定时间或地点时的外貌。
普通用词，着重由总体产生的印象。

word_group.brief_definition: 板着脸；绷着脸；面无表情
票面价值；面值；表面价值；字面意思

bilingual.target: 你现在可以看到她的脸了。

bilingual.source: It's not my face. It's my tooth.
bilingual.target: 不是我的脸，是我的牙齿。

bilingual.source: My dog has one cute little face.
bilingual.target: 我的狗有一张可爱的小脸。

bilingual.source: In these murals, every face was Negro.
bilingual.target: 在这些壁画中，每张脸都是黑人。

bilingual.source: I cut my face, and hurt my arms and knees.
bilingual.target: 我割伤了脸，伤了胳膊和膝盖。

bilingual.source: Look at the way your face has been washed.
bilingual.target: 看看你的脸是怎么被洗干净的。

list.abstract: face（英 [feɪs]，美 [feɪs]），英语单词，作名词用，为脸；面孔；面。作动词用，为面朝；面向；正对。短语搭配有be faced with（面临），例句为“The glaciers are disappearing, changing the face of Kilimanjaro.（冰川日渐消融，乞力马扎罗山的容颜在悄然而逝。）” face名词类近义词有surface、outside、garment等，不及物动词类近义词有open to，及物动词类近义词有accept、agree、recognize等，相关反义词有avoid、back。
Face是国内首款视频社交软件，是一款以视频为基础的全新陌生人移动社交工具，有别于微信、QQ、陌陌、YY、美拍、微视等手机软件，通过Face可以便捷地通过地理位置，看到附近人的视频，并认识和了解他们，拓展自己的社交圈。 每天有数十万的年轻人在使用Face拍摄短视频以及通过查看附近人的视频发现和认识更多有趣的陌生人，在Face上搭建属于你的视频社交圈，让“你我世界，一起Face”！

yingyinNormal.en: And then your face is bloated? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后你的脸就肿了？不是。

yingyinNormal.en: Chandler. What is the matter with your face?
yingyinNormal.zh: 钱德，你的脸到底是怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Scarecrow needs a face. That's right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 稻草人先生的脸也要装饰一下。说得没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine. I will melt her heart, and her face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我会用音乐融化她的心，还有她的脸。

yingyinNormal.en: He's spent months timing testing his monkey face design.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他花数月时间计时和测试猴脸设计。

yingyinNormal.en: Colonel, your face... You mean, why is it marked?
yingyinNormal.zh: 上校，你的脸。你是想问，为什么画成这样吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What is wrong with Stuart's face? I think he's smiling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斯图尔特的脸出了什么问题？他好像是在微笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, he's not baby face nelson. He's an actual baby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他又不是长着婴儿脸的罪犯，他就是个小孩而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, for starters, at some point, that face starts talking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先我要说那脸一开始讲话，就什么都幻灭了。

yingyinNormal.en: Dude I put that thing on my face!
yingyinNormal.zh: 神马，我还把那玩意贴我脸上呢！

yingyinNormal.en: You've got a Cheeto on your face, man.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你脸上有芝士，老兄。

yingyinNormal.en: Ella, what's that on your face? Madam?
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾拉，你脸上沾了什么？夫人？

yingyinNormal.en: Have I got something on my face, soldier?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我脸上有东西吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Max, hurry, give them the face! Hey, ladies, look.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克斯，快点，给她们脸色瞧瞧！姐儿们，快看。

yingyinNormal.en: Her last moments of terror still frozen on her face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她临终时的恐惧仍定格在她的脸上。

yingyinNormal.en: He does landscapes. Just relax your face. Sorry. No laughing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人家画的是景物。脸部放松。对不起。不要笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Get your face painted here. Suzy Sheep is in charge of the panting face store.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来这画脸啦。苏西负责画脸商店。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig is polishing the car so well, he can see his face in it. What a funny face. Oh. More funny faces.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸把车子擦得很干净，能印出他的脸。一张搞笑的脸！更多搞笑的脸。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I please see your face? Nope. You don't want to see a face covered with pox.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以看你的脸吗？不行，你不会想看一张痘子脸的。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig is polishing the car so well, he can see his face in it. What a funny face! Oh! More funny faces! It's Peppa and George! And Mummy Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸把车子擦得很干净，能印出他的脸。一张搞笑的脸！更多搞笑的脸。是佩琪和乔治！还有猪妈妈。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 面临; 应对; 接受

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 贴边；镶边；饰面；衬层；面层；异色镶边

word_family.mean: n. 脸；面孔；面；表面；表情；方面；脸色；面容；展示

sense_info_list.en: confront and deal with or accept
sense_info_list.zh: 面临; 应对; 接受

examination_example.sentence: Those retailers may <highlight>face</highlight> headaches complying with various state sales tax laws.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些零售商可能面临遵守各州销售税法的难题。

examination_example.sentence: While all of these countries <highlight>face</highlight> their own challenges, there are a number of consistent themes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然所有这些国家都面临着自己的挑战，但有一些一致的主题。

examination_example.sentence: Peretti suggests that, in <highlight>face</highlight> of the present situation, the Times should make strategic adjustments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Peretti建议，面对当前形势，泰晤士报应该做出战略调整。

examination_example.sentence: When we look at a <highlight>face</highlight> or a picture, our eyes pause on one spot at a time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们看一张脸或一幅画时，我们的眼睛一次停留在一个点上。

examination_example.sentence: Radesky cites the "still <highlight>face</highlight> experiment" devised by developmental psychologist Ed Tronick in the 1970s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Radesky引用了发展心理学家Ed Tronick在20世纪70年代设计的“静止面孔实验”。

examination_example.sentence: The overweight are sometimes pictured in the media with their <highlight>faces</highlight> covered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 媒体有时会拍到这些超重者的脸被遮住。

sense_info_list.en: cover the surface of a thing with a layer of a different material
be positioned with the face or front towards (someone or something)
a side or surface of something

exam_freq_info.chinese: (in the face of)面对; 在...面前; 不顾

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 匿名的；身份不明的；无个性的；单调乏味的

word_family.mean: n. 脸；面孔；面；表面；表情；方面；脸色；面容；展示

examination_example.sentence: What do successful people do when <highlight>faced</highlight> with difficulties?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成功人士面对困难时会怎么做？

examination_example.sentence: An unfamiliar digital human that has been created through CGI will also <highlight>face</highlight> the same challenge as an unknown actor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个不熟悉的通过CGI生成的数字人也将和一个不知名演员一样面临挑战。

examination_example.sentence: Compared with <highlight>face</highlight>-to-<highlight>face</highlight> communication, books often provide a better medium for changing people's beliefs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与面对面的交流相比，书籍往往为改变人们的信仰提供了更好的媒介。

examination_example.sentence: It's a narrative often drowned out by the shame that marketers rely on to peddle us their diet pills and <highlight>face</highlight> creams.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种说法常常被羞愧所淹没，因为营销者依赖这种羞愧来向我们兜售他们的减肥药和面霜。

examination_example.sentence: We've got a societal debate going on about access to our public commons, as it were, about famous <highlight>faces</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们正在进行一场社会辩论，辩论的主体是公共资源的获取，比如名人面孔就属于这种资源。

sense_info_list.en: an expression shown on the face

examination_example.sentence: They want to save <highlight>face</highlight> and avoid looking stupid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们想挽回面子，避免显得愚蠢。

sense_info_list.zh: (in the face of)面对; 在...面前; 不顾

word_usage.usage:
表示“在脸上”或描述面部表情时，一般用介词on不用in。
示例：She had a worried look on her face. 
她一脸担忧的样子。

"lose face"表示丢脸; "save one's face" 指保全面子，均为固定用法，不可随意替换。
示例：(1) I won't make you lose face in public. 
我不会当众使你难堪。
(2) He said so to save his face. 
他那样说是为了保全面子。

"a long face"不可直译为“长脸”，而是“不高兴的脸”。
示例：He came to me with a long face. 
他板着脸来找我。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 书面用词, 多指勇敢、冷静地面临某种问题、困难或任务等。
口语用词, 含义广, 侧重有勇气、决心或自信心去面对。
普通用词, 着重由总体产生的印象。
书面用词, 突出人或事物在某特定时间或地点时的外貌。
普通用词, 多用复数, 可与 appearance 换用, 但较口语化。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (物体)一面; 表面; 面向

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 匿名的；身份不明的；无个性的；单调乏味的

word_family.mean: n. 脸；面孔；面；表面；表情；方面；脸色；面容；展示

examination_example.sentence: At least 31 villages in Alaska <highlight>face</highlight> "immediate threats" due to climate change, the Government Accountability Office reported in 2009.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府问责办公室2009年报告称，由于气候变化，阿拉斯加至少有31个村庄面临“迫切威胁”。

examination_example.sentence: "We found that women are doubly vulnerable to marital break-up in the <highlight>face</highlight> of illness," Karraker said. "They're more likely to be widowed, and if they're the ones who become ill, they're more likely to get divorced. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: Karraker 说：“我们发现，在疾病面前女性易遭受婚姻破裂有着双重原因，她们更容易丧偶，而且如果女性是生病的一方，就更有可能离婚。”

examination_example.sentence: The gender gap on this question is even wider among working adults in their 30s and 40s, when many women <highlight>face</highlight> the trade-offs that go with work and motherhood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于30-40岁的职场人来说，性别差异在这一问题上的体现尤其明显。许多职场女性面临着在工作和为人母之间做权衡。

examination_example.sentence: So take the step of joining an organization to build <highlight>face</highlight>-to-<highlight>face</highlight> relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，采取加入组织的步骤来建立面对面的关系。

examination_example.sentence: Today's <highlight>faces</highlight> of income inequality and lack of opportunity look like all of us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今收入不平等和缺乏机会的局面看起来和我们所有人一样。

examination_example.sentence: When people first jump on an ebike, their <highlight>face</highlight> lights
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当人们第一次跳上自行车时，他们的脸在发光。

sense_info_list.en: cover the surface of a thing with a layer of a different material
the front or surface of an object
sense_info_list.zh: (物体)一面; 表面; 面向

examination_example.sentence: The labels <highlight>facing</highlight> smartly out, like a line of soldiers on review.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 标签巧妙地朝外，就像一排士兵在检阅一样。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>face</highlight> of income inequality, for all but a very few of us, is the one we each see in the mirror.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了我们中的少数人之外，收入不平等的面貌是我们每个人在镜子中看到的。

sense_info_list.en: an expression shown on the face

examination_example.sentence: It's true that black mothers are more affected by poverty than many other groups, yet they are disproportionately the <highlight>face</highlight> of poverty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确实，黑人母亲比许多其他群体更容易受到贫困的影响，但她们却不成比例地成为贫困的代名词。

word_usage.usage:
"a long face"不可直译为“长脸”，而是“不高兴的脸”。
示例：He came to me with a long face. 
他板着脸来找我。

"lose face"表示丢脸; "save one's face" 指保全面子，均为固定用法，不可随意替换。
示例：(1) I won't make you lose face in public. 
我不会当众使你难堪。
(2) He said so to save his face. 
他那样说是为了保全面子。

表示“在脸上”或描述面部表情时，一般用介词on不用in。
示例：She had a worried look on her face. 
她一脸担忧的样子。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 书面用词，多指勇敢、冷静地面临某种问题、困难或任务等。
口语用词，含义广，侧重有勇气、决心或自信心去面对。
普通用词，着重由总体产生的印象。
书面用词，突出人或事物在某特定时间或地点时的外貌。
普通用词，多用复数，可与 appearance 换用，但较口语化。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 匿名的；身份不明的；无个性的；单调乏味的

word_family.mean: n. 脸；面孔；面；表面；表情；方面；脸色；面容；展示

examination_example.sentence: The woman's eye fell on the man's <highlight>face</highlight>, and she immediately looked down and adjusted her scarf.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女人的目光落在男人的脸上，她立刻低下头，整理了一下围巾。

examination_example.sentence: Painters, sculptors-they've all tried to make the best of this ordinary <highlight>face</highlight>, but I'm afraid there's not much hope.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 画家、雕塑家——他们都尝试过把这张普通的脸发挥到极致，但恐怕希望不大。

examination_example.sentence: I turned around and saw a pleasant woman with a big smile on her <highlight>face</highlight> waving to wish me a safe trip.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我转过身来，看到一位和蔼可亲的女士脸上挂着灿烂的笑容，向我挥手祝我一路平安。

examination_example.sentence: What problem did the author <highlight>face</highlight> when she decided to begin her writing?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当作者决定开始写作时，她面临了什么问题？

examination_example.sentence: Unlike friendships that can fade or break, I know I'll always be connected to my mother no matter what I <highlight>face</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与可能褪色或破裂的友谊不同，我知道无论我面临什么，我都将永远与母亲联系在一起。

examination_example.sentence: Write a poem about how courage, determination, and strength have helped you <highlight>face</highlight> challenges in your life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 写一首关于勇气、决心和力量如何帮助你面对生活中的挑战的诗。

examination_example.sentence: Dogs may indeed be able to distinguish between happy and angry human <highlight>faces</highlight>, according to a new study.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据一项新的研究，狗也许真的能够区分人类高兴和愤怒的表情。

examination_example.sentence: Their <highlight>faces</highlight> were so powerful in sending a message of their despair (绝望) and need that I joined this project without hesitation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的表情如此有力地传达了他们的绝望和需要，以至于我毫不犹豫地加入了这个项目。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers trained a group of dogs to distinguish between images (图像) of the same person making either a happy or an angry <highlight>face</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员训练了一组狗来区分同一个人的图像，这些图像要么是高兴的表情，要么是愤怒的表情。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 直面; 正视; 面临; 面对
(in the face of)面临; 面对
(物体)面; 表面; 面向; 转向

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 贴边；镶边；饰面；衬层；面层；异色镶边

word_family.mean: n. 脸；面孔；面；表面；表情；方面；脸色；面容；展示

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 板着脸；绷着脸；面无表情

examination_example.sentence: Is it important to have a beautiful <highlight>face</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一张漂亮的脸蛋重要吗？

examination_example.sentence: He decided to accept his <highlight>face</highlight> and feel confident (自信的) in himself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他决定接受自己的脸，对自己充满信心。

examination_example.sentence: Speaking to new people <highlight>face</highlight> to <highlight>face</highlight> can make them feel nervous.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与陌生人面对面交谈会让他们感到紧张。

sense_info_list.zh: 直面; 正视; 面临; 面对

examination_example.sentence: We should <highlight>face</highlight> winning and losing properly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该正确地面对输赢。

examination_example.sentence: After entering high school, you may <highlight>face</highlight> some new challenges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 进入高中后，你可能会面临一些新的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: They easily break down when they <highlight>face</highlight> difficulties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们面对困难时很容易崩溃。

sense_info_list.zh: (in the face of)面临; 面对

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>face</highlight> of danger, all the firefighters were brave and none of them gave up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面对危险，所有的消防员都很勇敢，没有一个人放弃。

examination_example.sentence: The writer advises students to be brave in the <highlight>face</highlight> of pains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者建议学生要勇于面对痛苦。

examination_example.sentence: Jordan never gave up in the <highlight>face</highlight> of failure and finally he succeeded.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔丹在失败面前从不放弃，最后他成功了。

sense_info_list.en: the front or surface of an object
sense_info_list.zh: (物体)面; 表面; 面向; 转向

examination_example.sentence: This is the unknown <highlight>face</highlight> of the moon that is always looking away from us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是月球未知的一面，它总是背对着我们。

examination_example.sentence: May 31, 2019 is the 160th birthday of the largest four-<highlight>face</highlight> clock in the world-Big Ben.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2019年5月31日是世界上最大的四面钟——大本钟的160岁生日。

examination_example.sentence: At first I thought she was really looking at the fruits because she was <highlight>facing</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一开始我以为她真的在看水果，因为她正对着水果。

word_usage.usage:
表示“在脸上”或描述面部表情时，一般用介词on不用in。
示例：She had a worried look on her face. 
她一脸担忧的样子。

"lose face"表示丢脸; "save one's face" 指保全面子，均为固定用法，不可随意替换。
示例：(1) I won't make you lose face in public. 
我不会当众使你难堪。
(2) He said so to save his face. 
他那样说是为了保全面子。

"a long face"不可直译为“长脸”，而是“不高兴的脸”。
示例：He came to me with a long face. 
他板着脸来找我。
